snippet: The F.B.I. director wants the Justice Department to refute Mr. Trump’s contention that Barack Obama ordered the tapping of his phones, a claim that Mr. Comey says is false, officials said....

headline.main: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol

lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. director wants the Justice Department to refute Mr. Trump’s contention that Barack Obama ordered the tapping of his phones, a claim that Mr. Comey says is false, officials said.
